arts.ttl: Lecce vs. Cagliari to get matchday 4 underway
arts.sum: Lecce and Cagliari face off at the Via del Mare, with the home side seeking their first win and the Sardinians looking to build on a solid start Eusebio Di Francesco, Cagliari coach in 2020/21, is the former player of the day: 26 official games with a record of 5 wins, 6 draws, and 15 defeats.

arts.ttl: Lecce vs Cagliari Preview, Prediction, Possible Lineups and Betting Tips
arts.sum: Lecce are on the hunt for their first Serie A win of the season, as Eusebio Di Francesco’s side welcome Cagliari on September 19th and you can find our full preview, prediction, possible lineups and betting tips below. arts.sum: There is a full slate of Serie A matches taking place across Friday, Saturday, Sunday and Monday and Jamie Griffith previews all 10 games.
